references.paper_title: ID-like prompt learning for few-shot out-of-distribution detection
references.reason: This paper proposes a novel prompt-based method for OOD detection that uses ID-like outliers, which is directly compared against in the current work.

references.paper_title: LoCoOp: Few-shot out-of-distribution detection via prompt learning
references.reason: This paper is the main baseline method compared against in the paper, establishing a strong foundation for the current research.

references.paper_title: A baseline for detecting misclassified and out-of-distribution examples in neural networks
references.reason: This foundational paper establishes the concept and metrics for OOD detection, providing the basic theoretical context for the current work.

references.paper_title: Delving into out-of-distribution detection with vision-language representations
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the application of vision-language models for OOD detection, setting the stage for the current research direction.

references.paper_title: Learning to prompt for vision-language models
references.reason: This paper introduces the prompt tuning technique that is utilized as the basis for many of the methods discussed, including the current one.
